-- Import table for planes

    tailnum VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
    year INT,
    type VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    engines INT,
    seats INT,
    speed INT,
    engine VARCHAR(255)
);
